messages: a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (10:58): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9, 73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 - I added checking for all obsolete attributes to v.nu
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (10:58): checked in, and synced up http://qa-dev.w3.org:8888/
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (10:59): I did not test every single attribute
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (10:59): because there are so many of them
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:00): but I smoke-tested it and it seems to be working as expected
a11aabeeceeae6b8cb5d12ea06b56554 (11:00): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: Smoking is bad for you, have you not learnt?
73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 (11:03): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: <table bgcolor> doesn't give an obsolete message
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:05): 73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46: thanks -- I'll take a look at it in a bit and see what I muffed up
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:05): need to get some dinner first
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:05): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: the diff for the Assertions.java change is here:
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:07): I'm not sure that's the ideal way to do it, so I'm happy to change it if you see any issues with doing it that way
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:07): ah geez, looking at the diff I see what I missed
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:08): well, I see why there's no error message from bgcolor at least
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:08): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: instead of Arrays.asList, I suggest using Arrays.binarySearch on the raw array
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:08): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: I figured you might say that :)
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:08): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: OK, I will change that later
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (11:09): b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9: I guess that should be significantly faster?
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:09): a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2: other than that, looks good
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:09): I ran the deployment script, but it seems the new version didn't actually replace the old process
b8810fee2f4a71f849f3f7409546d1d9 (11:09): I'll look into that after lunch
73eaf221abca1b8244e34b0b9e76ac46 (11:17): <a methods> uses the relaxng error message
